divs: sighting detailsi was at six flags amusement park in jackson, nj 08527 on 8\27\2009. we were waiting on line for the kingda ka roller coaster when people all around us started looking up into the clouds at a perfect circular object with a black edge moving slowly in and out of the clouds but on a steady plane near the bottom of the heavy cloud cover. it went in and out but you could always see the black edge of the circle as it moved thru the clouds moving against the wind and clouds toward us and then passing near us everybody there was yelling ufo it could have been a hundred people that saw it. it was a perfect circle moving slowly against the wind for a half hour or more. send me an email if you get other reports of this event. thanks
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jackson
There were no other sightings in Jackson on or around August 27th 2009
Summary: A lot of people saw a perfect 360 degree circle with a black edge defining the shape moving slowly thru the clouds at Six Flags Amusement Park, Jackson, NJ 08527.
